thread.section_title: Park Lane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location; be aware of resort fee
thread.title_full: Great location; be aware of resort fee - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Utahtraveler888
title: Great location; be aware of resort fee
text: I have stayed at the Park Lane several times, and I enjoy it. The location on Central Park South is the hotel's best feature. The rooms are small, but comfortable. The elevators are very fast, especially compared with other boutique hotels in NY. Be aware when booking that a mandatory "resort fee" will be added to your bill at the time of your stay. The price per day is about $30-35 higher than listed because of the fee.
